title: Upper West Side Falafel
typeOfFood: Lacto, American, Fast food, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Turkish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Fast food eatery on the 5th floor mall food court. Menu is fashioned after an American theme with burgers and fries alongside pita wraps, hummus, and salad. Menu is around half veg suitable.
